Articles.Content: I was screwing around with planes and debug menu and i noticed that when something explodes, the debug section says that it sets "Explosion Awesomness = <Insert value here>" Is this a Easter egg or is it intended to be like so? PS. You can post other cool things to this thread if you want
It's time I started paying attention to that!!! That's cool, now I'm going to waste several hours trying to get my "awesomeness " as high as possible.

yep it's well known.

Take a look at the start up screen sometime. Lots of creative funny names for things all over.
